description: This table contains audit trail information for occurrence code 35 - the date physical therapy treatment started.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the summary block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PT_TREATMENT_HX_DATE
columns.description: This audit trail item stores past values of the date physical therapy (PT) treatment started.

columns.name: PT_TREATMENT_DATE_USER_ID
columns.description: This audit trail item stores users who changed the value of the date physical therapy (PT) treatment started.

columns.name: PT_TREATMENT_DATE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This audit trail item stores the instant users changed the value of the date physical therapy (PT) treatment started.
